name: hesitantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not immediate or quick because you are nervous or not certain: She approached the teacher hesitantly. "I'm afraid," he says hesitantly, "I forgot that today is our anniversary." See
hesitant
More examplesFewer examplesShe confirmed the rumor, hesitantly.He spoke hesitantly, guarded, in a raspy voice. People hesitantly trickled out of hiding and onto the dusty streets of the capital.
